comment.author: 39628197@N08
comment._content: Astonishing, the live trees with stairs hacked in them and then the miniature Sphinx as stately and stony as can be. A gorgeous panorama, Mary!

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content:
To Thomaspetermeuller: It's not that the sphinx is small, as it is over 6 ft tall including the base, it's that the trees are so tall -- about 40 ft at a guess. They sort of dwarf anything in front of them.
 
To AnnabelB: thanks.

~Mary
